name: Sacrifices To Wooblicitus
description:
The towns people are threatened by demons lurking at every corner.
The only way to strengthen your army, is to sacrifice it.
Sacrifices Must be Made, The Great Woobliticus decrees it

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space or J to attack

Attack Demons to deal damage

Attack townsfolk to knock them out and pick them up

Cary townsfolk to the slab altar to sacrifice them.

A sacrificed townsfolk will be replaced by one with full health

Submission to LD43 "Sacrifices Must Be Made"

Rate the game here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/sacrifices-to-wooblicitus
